title: Include google collections jar
description: Clustering already ships the google collections jar. We can add it to the core and all components can benefit from it.

comments.author: Noble Paul
comments.content: The 1.0 final jar. I plan to commit this shortly

comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
comments.content: Is there an actual use for them or are we just doing it for some future benefit?

comments.author: Noble Paul
comments.content: java's default collection implementations are inefficient for immutable collections. I plan to move code to use google collections where immutable collections are used.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
Correcting Fix Version based on CHANGES.txt, see this thread for more details...
